title: Baylor College of Medicine, Texas Children’s Hospital study will look at best treatment for prolonged ...
text: ( Source : Baylor College of Medicine ) A study to determine which of three drugs commonly used to treat a condition called status epilepticus is most effective begins this month under the direction of Baylor College of Medicine and Texas
